@conor_pope tomorrow I'll email you the top 50 bestselling books in Ireland and U.K. so far this year. You can judge for yourself then.
@conor_pope There are always 'reading' fads. They're still physical books though. Kids books sales up most, which is positive for future.
@conor_pope thanks for response. We'll catch up in 20 years maybe. I'll bet there are still more physical than digital books sold even then.
